about_the_game:
Mr. Raccoon—of Raccoon City fame—is back and more charming than ever! Gunning for new heights as a decorative weapon attachment, he's popular amongst local hunters.

Once downloaded, this item can be obtained via the in-game merchant. Apply this custom part to a specific shotgun to have the charm appear in-game on your weapon.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Mr. Raccoon—of Raccoon City fame—is back and more charming than ever! Gunning for new heights as a decorative weapon attachment, he's popular amongst local hunters.

Once downloaded, this item can be obtained via the in-game merchant. Apply this custom part to a specific shotgun to have the charm appear in-game on your weapon.
name: Resident Evil Village - Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Resident Evil Village - Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm - $0.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Resident Evil Village - Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance (when set to Prioritize Performance): 1080p/60fps. ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 required to support ray tracing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 required to support ray tracing.

short_description: Mr. Raccoon—of Raccoon City fame—is back and more charming than ever! Local hunters say he brings good luck. This item can be obtained via the in-game merchant. Apply this custom part to a certain shotgun to have the charm appear in-game on your weapon.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Thai
*languages with full audio support
